message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $12000 by us. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your endeavors, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $10800. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest early on. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
